net.darmo_creations.utils

Class JarUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.darmo_creations.utils.JarUtil

  • public final class JarUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides useful methods to handle the jar, restart the application, etc.
    Author:
    Damien Vergnet

                           throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Returns:

      • restartApplication

        public static void restartApplication(java.lang.String executableExtension)
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      java.net.URISyntaxException
        Restarts the application. The method fetches the installed Java binaries and then the jar. Once all has been found, a new process is created for the new application and the current one is closed by calling System.exit(0).
        Parameters:
        executableExtension - the extension of the executable file to run. If null, the ".jar" extension is used
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the executable or Java could not be found
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the jar path is ill-formed
